data.message: U need a holiday u can go to Seychelles island it's where I'm from like paradise no papparrazi prince William & princess Kate went there for their honeymoon and had privacy plus most of them are virgins cause we believe in sex after marriage and you could enjoy with your family a mistical island we have a mystical plant which makes the coco der mer it takes 21yrs for this  coconut to grow and develops my family have lots of land your welcome to stay u could call it the garden of Eden anyway your phenomenal stay hot mwa your beats are dibolical.*giggles *
